name: APOGEE (johnbaker)
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a Young Astronaut? Maybe. Did we forget to put sufficient fuel on the rocket? Probably.

Take control, test your reflexes and reach your APOGEE!

Best experienced on your mobile device: https://apogee.theyoungastronauts.com

  • The Young Astronauts
  • John Baker
  • Brandon Ainsley
  • Tyler Savery
